statements: UPDATE baseball_stadiums SET capacity=50000, tickets_sold=45000 WHERE stadium_id=1;
UPDATE baseball_stadiums SET location='Los Angeles', fan_demographics='{"age_group": ["18-25", "26-35"], "loyalty": "high"}' WHERE stadium_id=2;
UPDATE baseball_stadiums SET attendance_numbers = 50000, tickets_sold = 35000 WHERE stadium_id = 1
UPDATE baseball_stadiums SET fan_demographics = '{"age": [25,30,35,40], "gender": ["male", "female"]}' WHERE stadium_id = 2
UPDATE ticket_sales SET ticket_price = 50.00, seat_number = 101 WHERE ticket_id = 1;
UPDATE fan_demographics SET city = 'New York', gender = 'Female' WHERE fan_id = 2;

UPDATE Stadiums SET stadium_name = 'New Stadium Name', location = 'New Location' WHERE stadium_id = 1;
